section.title: Sun Application Server
section.para: This agent returns performance metrics for a Sun Application Server.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: The agent supports both local and remote modes.

sect2.title: Supported Versions
sect2.para: The agent supports Sun Application Server versions 8.x

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following configuration options are available:

itemizedlist.listitem: Username: user name to use when connecting to Sun Application Server
Password: password to use when connecting to Sun Application Server
Connection string: the JMX URL used to connect to Sun Application Server
Show only runtime data: if true only runtime mbeans are displayed
